snippet: Fans in Ontario made do with the Cornwall Colts, the city's Junior A team.
abstract: Fans in Ontario made do with the Cornwall Colts, the city's Junior A team.

headline.main: Opening Day Without the N.H.L.: 'It's Something to Watch on a Thursday Night'
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Is Frozen Out, but the Game Goes On: Thursday Night in Ottawa
